item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Bottom of Torbay Road, 22nd July
item.description:
This end of Torbay Road near the Tesco is constantly filled with litter, on the road and pavement. This is a daily occurrence where the residents have now taken upon themselves to clean the street but the council needs to do more, either more regular sweeping or put up signs advising against it or a street bin nearby.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Want to remove holly tree in my garden, 22nd July
item.description:
